Introducing Hyde

28 Dec 2013
Hyde is a brazen two-column Jekyll theme that pairs a prominent sidebar with uncomplicated content. It’s based on Poole, the Jekyll butler. What's Jekyll?

06 Feb 2012
Jekyll is a static site generator, an open-source tool for creating simple yet powerful websites of all shapes and sizes.
